website_summaries.verdict: A glittery twist on a lava lamp with fun features, reliability, and a modest price.
pros: It's full of glitter and you can write on it with chalk
cons: Distinctly feminine color scheme limits the appeal of this lamp
Also not a true lava lamp – you won't see any floating blobs of wax here

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, colorful glitter lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, colorful glitter lamp!! I always loved my mom's silver ones she had at the top of the stairs when I got home at night. It just made the house feel so warm and welcoming. Now I have my own and I think I like the rainbow one even better than my mom's!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute,my daughter loves it. She got it for Christmas but while putting it together I clumsily broke the bulb but I ordered a pack a two at a good cost and it works perfectly. She keeps it on top of her bookshelf. After a couple hours it gets hot but that is expected. Overall I definitely recommend it for any age
customer_reviews.author: Chris Reckord

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews before I ordered it, and since the reviews weren't great, I felt like I was taking a risk....amd I'm glad I took that chance. This thing is awesome! Works perfectly. Beautiful. Couldn't be happier! Be mindful that it takes a couple hours to get started initially, after that, about 20 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Poole

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The glass has scratches and peal spots where the color is gone, along with the fact that not all of the wax is together. Their are small fragments of wax floating around and I had to go out to buy a bulb before using it, the one that came with it was broke. What a rip off!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Broege

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped out to us in Hawaii. Packaging was good. Ordered a pair of spare bulbs just in case anything busted during shipping, but didn't need them (will save for future replacement). We got the glitter lamp as a gift and our 8 year old looooves it. I was curious as to how the glitter lamp would work on relation to a regular, old-fashioned lava lamp - worried unnecessarily about it. It's beautiful. There is a flow to the glitters and the shimmer radiates off the walls ever so slightly. It's beautiful. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aep005

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Normal size! Only 2 cons!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS THING!!! So beautiful me and the kids both are mesmerized by it! It's a normal sized lava lamp. Only cons are it gets very hot and I've had to replace the bulbs twice in 2 or 3 months. I mean you can get them for a dollar for 2 but I clicked the turn roller thing to turn it on one too many times and it blew the bulb, another time it fell over and it blew. Other lava lamp never a problem so beware of frequent bulb replacements but super inexpensive to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Damage product
customer_reviews.text: I really love the design of the lamp. It works perfectly fine. However, it was damaged when I opened it. the lamp was almost half empty (see picture attached). It did not look at all the way it was presented on the website. I would like a new replacement or my money back. This was such a disappointment as it was a gift for my daughter and I was unable to give it to her under these conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: It's very beautiful...
customer_reviews.text: The little snippet of a video I took really doesn't do it justice...the glitter is actually much more sparkly in person. I gave it 4 stars because the base was slightly bent(though not noticable once it was put together) Despite the minor flaw, I'm really happy with it and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Abby l.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy something from Amazon to be given as gift unless you are giving it right away!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for gift for the next month. When given/opened, lamp did not work at all and return window was 30 days from purchase date. Don't buy something on Amazon that you are going to use as a gift unless you are giving it right away. I bought this because it was a good price, but by the time it was opened and found to be defective, the return window had closed.
customer_reviews.author: Beekeeper3

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!! It works for a short period of time and then dies!!
customer_reviews.text: It, when I got it it was cool as I'm a child of the 60's. And it did well for NINE months until suddenly it stopped erupting. So, I changed out the 25W light bulb. No change. So I went up to a 40W bulb thinking it would heat up the wax more...Nothing. So, it's just a piece of cool-shaped glass with wax laying at the bottom of it. It will go in the trash soon....Stay away!!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Finally got one...
customer_reviews.text: Been intrigued by the concept of the lava lamp ever since I was a kid back in the 60's and 70's. Bought this one because I was attracted to the gold color scheme. This is my first time owning a lava lamp and I love it. A couple of notes, however. This particular lamp gets pretty hot so I would suggest plugging directly into the wall outlet unless you have a heavy duty strip handy. And I would not recommend leaving unattended either because of its heat generation. Other than that, I love the quality and weight of this item but only time will tell how deep the quality will go. Thanks for reading this comment.
customer_reviews.author: Pixydust

customer_reviews.title: No lava moving- read the reviews before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. The lava stays on the bottom of the lamp and does not move at all. I followed the instructions. I should have read the reviews better, seems like this is a common problem with this lava lamp. Very disappointed since it was a gift for my son to Christmas and now I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This lava lamp is great. The colors are very vibrant and the wax seems to melt a lot more quickly after several months of use. The only downside is there are tiny pieces of wax that don't melt back into the rest, so they float around the bottle freely. When I received the lamp the lightbulb it came with was completely broken. But they're inexpensive to replace, so it wasn't too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves This
customer_reviews.text: It’s a retro lava lamp reminiscent of the 60s and 70s. My granddaughter wanted one for Christmas so I bought this. It arrived broken but was quickly replaced and I wasn’t required to return the broken item. Granddaughter loves it and uses it as a nightlight though it seems a bit too bright to me for that. Only real downside is that like so many other products these days...it’s made in China rather than the US as the old 60 models were.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I returned because the yellow wax stayed in the bottom & would not float at all. This is the second one & it worked for a month. Now the yellow wax will not move from the top and I am too late to have it returned. Kind of sad as it was given as a Christmas gift. What a piece of junk!!!! I would give it NO stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Cute Lava Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and can be kept on for hours without overheating because it only uses a 25 watt bulb. Perfect for a girl's room and makes for hours of entertaining shadows and illuminations on the walls and ceiling thanks to the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for our 8 year old's room for Christmas, only to learn that the 'lava' inside of it never left the blob at the base where the light bulb is located. The lava lamp we had as kids would have bubbles of floating lava rising and falling inside...this just has a green blob globe in the bottom and its been plugged in a turned on for days! Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Miller

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for long term use.
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first, but after a few weeks the lava started to show signs of being burnt (like when you burn eggs or some other kind of food) even though it was not turned on for more than a few hours at a time and not even every other day. Now the lava won't rise and fall as it's supposed to...even after trying to shake the lava loose from the rop. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Lamp turns on but that's about it...
customer_reviews.text: It is a lava light and does kind of work.. that is it turns on and heats up but the gel inside hardly moves making this more of a very hot lamp but not much in the form of psychedelics. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Alicia MTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Decent but cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's room. It's cool and works fine, but the construction is a bit flimsy. You can tell the metal is very thin and overall it just feels kinda cheap. But hey, you get what you pay for. Pay attention to the dimensions, because it's probably much smaller than you think it is. This is not one of those fancy large lava lamps from your college days. My came with the bulb broken, but a quick trip to the store for a cheap new bulb easily resolved. Did you know they actually sell "lava lamp bulbs"? You do now.
customer_reviews.author: 8675 3oh9999

customer_reviews.title: Wiring issue?
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this lava lamp. It’s beautiful....when it works. It seems like it may have a short in it. I use it in my classroom about once a week when my students take a quiz or test. It has malfunctioned a little since the first time I used it (August 16). Now, each time I turn it on, it blinks or goes out completely for several seconds. I thought it was the bulb at first, but that didn’t fix the problem. Seems to be in the wiring. If I hold the cord just right, it stays on.
customer_reviews.author: K.L.

customer_reviews.title: A DUD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift. When it arrived the bulb was broken so before he could use it we had to go out and buy a new bulb. It worked a little for the first few days and since then, the lava does nothing. It's just a ball on the bottom of the lamp. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Debora

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasing to the eye
customer_reviews.text: This glitter lamp is beautiful! I gifted this to my boss for her birthday and she runs it in her office daily. Glitter lamps are cool because they create such amazing designs on the wall, depending on the light. The lamp is misleading in it's color (metal and glitter) looking too bold and child like. The gold is actually a soft color and the multi-color glitter looks nice. I would recommend this lamp for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: koclaire

customer_reviews.title: Theses are horrible. They are plugged in all day and night ...
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 3 of these in a row. None of them work!!! Theses are horrible. They are plugged in all day and night for 3 days. The wax doesn't move. It's just sirs at the bottom in a blob. Everyone has been the same. Are these just a gimmick now?? Do they work at all? I've been reading blogs and reviews to find out if I need to 'do' anything to make mine flow. No one has any answers with a LOT of people saying the same thing. They just are garbage from China. Sorry to say. Boo, Lava Lamp!!! Go back to the 70s where you belong!
customer_reviews.author: Aprilsblissed

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT LIVE UP TO ADVERTISED COLOR
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the lamp color. I bought it for my 10 year old grandson and although it was advertised as Red, which he asked for, it came bright Pink!! I didn't open the package before I gave it to him so didn't know it was Pink until he opened it. He was really bummed out with the color. I had to order a blue one after that to make him happy and will be saving the Pink one for my granddaughter. Oh well, just be cautious of your choice because it might not come as you think!
customer_reviews.author: T. LEEDS

customer_reviews.title: Works just like mine did as a teenager in 90's!
customer_reviews.text: My sons lava lamp was a gift for x-mas and today it still works great! Hmm I think for this one I did switch out the bulb bc the glass was sitting on the bulb itself and not on the metal ring. It was not sitting flat but moving and sliding around ontop of the glass light bulb which to me was alarming. I found another bulb just like it and it seemed to screw in much better. Even with my tiny hands it was kind of hard to screw in tight so the glass pieces would not touch. It was just the bulb but the lamp itself is great! Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: ErinBecause

customer_reviews.title: a most excellent lamp
customer_reviews.text: This sparkling lamp is sooo beautiful I can't believe it. I love it. I love it. I am not usually this enthusiastic, but this lamp is gorgeous. You won't be sorry if you get one. I think it would make a great gift esp. for girls and ladies who like disco balls and unicorns. But prolly won't be able to get them for long, since the bioweapon broke out in China where it is made.
customer_reviews.author: Honoria Hughes

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the lamp the bright multi colored glitter was beautiful but within two weeks the red and blue glitter had faded so now there is really only green and silver glitter. It is not nearly as pretty as jt was when the blue and red were bright and glittery also. It is pretty but I am definitely disappointed that those colors faded so quickly! It has changed the whole look of the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty. It sparkles off the wall at night. It comes with a bulb and all you do is screw it in and put things together. It takes about 5 minutes for it to warm up and get full effect. I thought it was only gold colors in from the picture but actually, it’s multi colored and I wound up liking even better! Vary soothing and gives off a good amount of ambient light.
customer_reviews.author: Tropical breeze

customer_reviews.title: My 'blob' lava lamp died
customer_reviews.text: and I was sad. I even checked out YouTube for a fix and just decided to get me a new one. I picked this glittery gold one. EVERYONE who has come into my apartment LOVES it. I have been very good and deserve this gift to me. When I listen to the news, I just mute the TV and glance over at the gold lamp and smile. Get you one, you deserve it's sparkly glow too.
customer_reviews.author: vcline

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service when required
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product is good, it arrived with a light bulb that was broken, I contacted customer service and they promptly refunded me a percentage of the purchase price and that allowed me to go purchase a new light bulb at my local hardware store! Nothing wrong with the product other than the light bulb and that was easily resolved thank you
customer_reviews.author: mary h

customer_reviews.title: The incredible everlasting lava lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my (38 y.o.) boyfriend and he absolutely LOVES it! So much so that he actually wants to buy a bunch more lol. Works exactly as described. Definitely took more than 2 hours to warm up and get going on the first use, more like 6-8, but works perfectly after that. I can’t believe how long the bulb has actually lasted (still on the original), especially after reading other reviews. It’s been going strong for 6-7 weeks now with daily use. Has even had multiple weekends running 48 hours straight! I was beyond skeptical when ordering this but am so happy I did. No complaints here! (And that’s rare haha)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E

customer_reviews.title: First one didn’t work, second one is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son on Christmas for his newly remodeled room. It didn’t work. It would warm up, but the “lava” stayed a hard lump in the bottom. We were very disappointed, and I was just going to get a refund, but he really wanted the lamp, so I exchanged it for another one. This one works great! He loves it. The top piece that covers the bottle cap is bent, but we just put that to the wall. He has used it in everyday since the replacement came, and it’s hard to stop watching! A rough beginning, and somewhat irritating, but on track now.
customer_reviews.author: KnitGirl45

customer_reviews.title: Love the novelty of it.
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one of these! Mesmerizing and adds color and mood to room. You can only keep it on a few hours at a time though. So thats dissapointing. Also it cant sit in a sunny spot sothat made finding a good spot for in my sunny living room challenging. Also, its more beautiful than the pictures. Mine has warms shades of pink, coral, orange, and yellow inside. I was expecting it to look like the picture on amazon but its better. And my camera phone diesnt capture the beautiful rich subtleties of color either.
customer_reviews.author: Artsyzeal

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This multi-color glitter lava lamp with the gold base is great. It heats up quickly so that it starts looking amazing (glitter flows up like lava near the bulb / heat source and then falls around and back down to bottom of lamp) in only a minute or two. I liked it so much that I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Quality Is Free

customer_reviews.title: My retro-minded daughter asked for one for Christmas. She ...
customer_reviews.text: My retro-minded daughter asked for one for Christmas. She actually thought they weren't available anymore! She was soooo surprised when she opened it! She hooked it up right away, and I have to make her turn it off to give it a rest!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lava lamp for every occasion
customer_reviews.text: Have a desk? Put a lava lamp on it. Nightstand? Needs a lava lamp. Planning a wedding? Gonna need 150 of these puppies. Funeral? Lighten the mood with a lava lamp by the casket. I’m telling you, you need a lava lamp bro. This thing will change your life.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Defective like the others
customer_reviews.text: like the other reviews say, it arrived not even turning on. I wiggled it several times and eventually i managed to get it to turn on. 20 minutes later while I am eating dinner I see a bright flash from my room and I go in and the light blew. This is cheaply made merchandise and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nship

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I'd hoped. Pictures do not do it justice. It's extremely beautiful! The rainbow glitter is multicolored, but the overall effect is predominantly a pinkish gold, very warm and lovely light. I do give it a very gentle to and fro tip to distribute the glitter before turning it on. Follow the manufacturer's instructions to never do this when the lamp is warm or hot! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Erin I.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I literally just got this about 20 minutes ago. It arrived in a flimsy box and out of the box the frame the lamp sits in is bent. Placed the bulb in as directed and had to swivel the cord to get it to light. Carefully placed the lamp into the base and it will not light. So disappointed. Would give zero stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Amy J.

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs poor quality, defective
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks good and flows well when it has a working bulb. The first order had a broken lightbulb that exploded when I turned it on the fist time, and the replacement only lasted for a month with occasional use. Went with another model that had better quality control
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: So sparkly, and still colorful after many uses
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas to use at night when falling asleep. She loves sparkly things, and she certainly loves this! The glitter is rainbow colored and has not faded over time (have used it every night for a month) as other reviews have stated. I do turn it off 3-4 hours after she goes to sleep though. Anyway, I plan to buy these for any of her friends’ birthday parties coming up this spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Mozes

customer_reviews.title: and I think this one is my favorite of all
customer_reviews.text: I have owned dozens of Lava lamps, and I think this one is my favorite of all. I wasn't sure I would like the glitter as opposed to the traditional lava, but I LOVE IT! It is so pretty and casts a really lovely light. The glitter moves slowly around the globe like lava. I was really on the fence too about the multi-colored glitter, but it is beautiful! UPDATE: The glitter has faded, all the red is gone after about 2 weeks. It's still pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Terling

customer_reviews.title: All that glitters is gold
customer_reviews.text: Im only reminded to write a review because the lamp that was given to my daughter by santa is sitting next to me on the nightstand. It is gorgeous, makes a wonferul light show on the ceiling and walls, and is the perfect amount of light to read by in the dark. I stole it from her room. My own mom wants one now for her bday and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Whitman

customer_reviews.title: So stunning! I am so obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Even better than I expected!! It’s SO bright and SO glittery. I love the rainbow sparkles because it makes it look even more intense. The sparkles move slower than I thought they would but I actually prefer it that way! Going to put this at my work desk so I can watch it every day! 10/10 recommend. Would make a great gift as well. Super simple to set up and came in perfect condition! Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Vetter

customer_reviews.title: cheery light for dark times
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. It's bright and cheerful and heats up quickly. The glitter reminds me of the confetti style layers of birthday cake.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Williams

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Return Item...
customer_reviews.text: This is a return and DEFECTIVE item that they tried playing off as a new and unopened item. The bulb was already in the lamp and it was leaking. Doesn’t work. The lava doesn’t melt nor bubble. Bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday, and it’s completely disappointing that this doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: One exactly like it had been given to my son as a ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was a birthday gift for a friend. One exactly like it had been given to my son as a gift so I knew I had to get one for my friend, who likes all things glittery and sparkly. We did have a problem that the bulb only worked for about half an hour when we plugged it in, so my husband found a replacement for her.
customer_reviews.author: yuri68

customer_reviews.title: Really 'glittery' - wife says 'A 70s disco ball'
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I have a bunch of lava flow lamps and this is my first glitter style. Some folks commented about the flow of the liquid but I found that it started immediately and looks great. A bright, glittery look in the midst of a pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Dean H. Wooldridge Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It provides a really nice decorative light.
customer_reviews.text: I had a color changing glitter swirling Christmas tree decoration in my room over the holiday season. It provided the perfect light and I hated to see it go so I needed a year-round replacement. I Rely heavily on reviews and definitely noticed they were mixed for this item. I bought it and love it! It's a perfect size and provides a perfect light in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 whole months....
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED this lamp when she got it in April. Here we are 3 months later and the light has burned out. There does not appear to be any way to replace the light. We were very vigilant about not leaving it plugged in for long periods of time and we are very disappointed that it is basically useless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: J. Southers

customer_reviews.title: So so so cool
customer_reviews.text: Never dissapointed with these lava lamps. I dropped the bulb and broke the inside so I ran to my local Ace Hardware and but a new bulb for like 3$ it works great. It completes the room and the purple metal one with reddish yellow orange lava and purple glass tint is the best one/ color
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I love this SO much
customer_reviews.text: Simply breathtaking. I love this SO much. I only removed one star because it gets incredibly hot after it's been left on for a couple hours or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: To all who say these don't work. Be sure to carefully read the instructions. There is a metal coil in the bottom of the vase on the inside. It must be flat on the bottom. During shipping it gets out of place. All you have to do is twirl it around like the instructions say and you're in business. I almost missed that instruction as well.
customer_reviews.author: kevin adams

customer_reviews.title: Niece Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my niece for her 7th birthday. She was excited because her older cousin has the same one. It was a great alternative to a toy gift for a child that has way more toys than she could ever play with. She set it up in her room right away. It works really well and lit up the entire room with a soft glow. I would gift this to someone else if I had the opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: OMG it's GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I am a traditional lava lamp lover (ball of wax up comes down) but this glitter one caught my eye because of its deep gold casing. I am sooooo happy I got it - it's absolutely gorgeous in person!!! DO NOT MISS IT if you like what you see in the pic you're going to fall in love in person. I loved the one I bought for my living room so much I bought another for my office. Enough said. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with lighting and have several different products that produce different lighting effects and this one is just beautiful. So soothing watching the "lava" bubble up and down. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp. Easy to assemble, after two hours of warming up it was oozing to perfection. Plus it's Seahawks colors. Can't go wrong. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: noelle521

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box. The top of the lamp is leaking and 1/4 of liquid missing. Package was not damaged at all. This is a quality issue Returning it tomorrow and going to the store to buy one in person.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Works great my daughter loves it! I ordered two of these lamps but the other one was green for my son but I never received it so I don't know how it would have worked. Customer service was great in helping me with the problem but it would have been nice to get them on the same day since I am giving them to my children.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not lava, but glitter. Still Fab
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 13 year old niece for Christmas. I did not give it to her yet but I know this will meet her standards. I was a bit caught off guard when it was NOT a lava lamp, but it is not advertised as a lava lamp so that was my own lack of reading and paying attention. Regardless I think she will really love this.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CRAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is total piece of crap. Don't waste a single penny on this junker. It never worked right out of the box. The wax just lays on the bottom like a sloth and never moves...no matter how long you wait for it to heat up. After about a week, the little dial switch shorted out and now it doesn't work unless you shake the cord. Since I plan on keeping my house and don't want to burn it down, this little turd is off to the landfill. In case your wondering...I missed my return date to send it back!
customer_reviews.author: Island Time

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lava lamp. Highly recommend this product. I even knocked it over by accident... (my feet got caught on the cord under my desk). I broke the light bulb, yes, but bought a new one and it works perfectly, everything else is in great condition. (The picture is with the new bulb)
customer_reviews.author: a girl in SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL!! Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely BEAUTIFUL!! Granddaughter loves it. Puts out a lot of light and beautiful sparkles on the walls and ceiling. So much better than the regular lava lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Manor

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, the lamp is not screwed together. I dropped the glass when I picked it up by the base. You also have tighter the bulb into the base or it doesn’t turn on. It does get warm.
customer_reviews.author: ArcadiaPlace

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for over a year and it’s taken a tumble over a dozen times and still works. This thing is more well put together than I am. It’s also super cute and a good alternative to an actual lava lamp which can burn and get crusty feet bee time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Metal Lava Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I am a Lava Lamp fanatic...never met one I didn't like. I bought this one primarily so I could use the metallic green base with the red volcanic Lava Lamp arriving tomorrow.
